Loved the cable knit and white trim. Soft, not scratchy at all. Warm without being hot. Fits true to size, I ordered a medium so it would be a little longer

This was a gift, but the color was more purple/pink than expected and the material is thinner and less bulky than expected. It also has a black ring around the neck and around the waist that was unexpected, but it is pretty soft and I guess it's pretty comfortable.
I absolutely love the sweater. True to size. Isn’t too thick or too thin. It’s baggy, and so soft.
Wife liked it.
The sweater looks like it does in the pictures and fits well.  True to size.
I really like this sweater but I’ve been noticing some threads starting to loose
This sweater was so cute worn off one shoulder with leggings.  I would purchase again.

I read all the reviews and paid attention!! I ordered a size smaller than normal- still a good loose fit. I am 5'5 144lb and got a medium. I got the cream with brown/ burgundy collar. I love a cable knit sweater and have a few that were bought for me from " Brand Stores" . This is right up there with them. I like that this isn't very heavy- perfect to wear a tank/cami or tshirt under. I am buying another!
Very nice.

An attractive, big chunky sweater that looks great and is warm and comfortable. Washes nicely in the washing machine and then I let it air dry on a hanger. Quality and while it is a heavy sweater, it feels comfortable. A good buy.

评论概述: Size L fits like an XL.

I really liked this sweater. The XL fit me as suggested in a slightly oversized look, which was what I wanted. The fabric is a little dry and dense, I guess, not super soft, but it’s not itchy or uncomfortable at all. I think the knitting could be a little tighter, but for how it is, it’s still really warm and slightly heavyweight. I would def recommend it.

I got the black with white trim. It's a loose knit and a little see through. If you plan to wear a shirt under it, you'll be fine. I wanted to have the option to not so i sent it back. It's cute though.
Super soft, easy to wash & dry flat, warm cotton is so much nicer than a polyester sweater.
Love the style and colors. Because the way it is made, it can be considered “see thru” but if you wear an appropriate colored bra to match or nude color, it’s all good.
I have two of these. The weight is good for a colder day. They are good quality for the price. I do not find them scratchy. If I need more warmth I wear a fitted long sleeve shirt under.
I wore a shirt under because the knit is kind of spaced out. Cute fit

评论概述: Exactly what I was looking for
评论详情: The sweater is made of good material and is soft and perfectly proportioned.  Very happy with my purchase.
Was edged w green on cuffs and neckline. Not all navy as advertised. Will donate.
Fits great and very cute, but very loosely woven, can almost see through in spots. Not worth the price…could get the same quality from SHEIN for a lot less $.
Liked the weight of the sweater and the different color trim. A little see thru with the knitted texture and the holes. Will wear a camisole under it. May buy another, only if they are discounted.
This sweater is not too warm but looks great with added color around the edges. It fits well, and the pricing was reasonable. Thank you for the quick service.

I bought this sweater for my step-daughter and found a different one that was more her style. I had all intentions of returning this one, but out of the package, I really loved the soft quality of the knit. I’m sensitive to many fabrics so it’s a challenge to find nice sweaters that I can tolerate. The color is a lovely dark grey with white trim at the wrists neck and waist. The photo looked darker than the actual sweater, but it was still lovely. The weight of the sweater kept me very warm on a very cold day without making me feel as if I was sweltering. I wore it for a holiday with black slacks, and received so many compliments that I was almost embarrassed to say that it was a regift to myself. This time a a sweater that will look great with jeans or dressed up with a nice skirt or slacks. My only complaint was that it snagged on a few things, but that’s more my clumsiness. Overall, a great sweater.
I love the sweater. Looks just like the picture.  It is crochet or loosely knitted. It won’t keep you warm because of how it knitted. Might need a tank under it.

I got the sweater in this color and the forest green color.  It is oversized but not too much so with the brown trimmed one I got a large and decided to wash in warm and dry in dryer and it did shrink up enough that I like it.  The forest green I got a medium and do like the fit a little better.  I like oversized for most sweaters but for this one I wanted it a bit more fitted. Either way I love them both.  It washed well and my friend couldn’t believe it was off of Amazon.  The weave is a smidge loose so I layer with a tshirt.  I wore the green one with green Steve Madden sneakers and it was super cute and sporty.
Love it! perfect fit and great quality!

The reason I only gave two stars is because the sizing is way way off! The large looks like a small and fits like a small. So I have to go up to a XX large in order for it to fit as a size large. Do not go by Amazons recommended sizing, Please read the sizing chart by the manufacturer.  As far as the fabric and the sweater itself, it is a nice sweater. It’s thick. It’s gotta look or look to it, but that sizing is very disappointing. So this is going back.

Nice style, runs really big. I usually have to buy xl when buying clothes from China but the description said runs true to size so I got a large. At least i I think it was a large. Very nice sweater. Love the color. Sizing is correct and isn’t baggy.

Haven't washed it yet, but I don't think there will be a problem.

I absolutely love this sweater! It’s perfect for slouchy fall days.  I like to wear it with a matching undershirt because the beige one is enough to be see through / too airy in cool air.  It’s comfortable and soft and knitted well!
I read reviews suggested sizing down - so I ordered a S, normally I wear a M, and the S is huge !

评论概述: Warm, cute and well made for price
评论详情: 5’5” 150# & went with a medium. Soft, warm. Black color has color variations so looks more charcoal which I like but a true black would be nice contrasted against the white trim on neck & cuffs. Wide, boxy fit, hem hits below the hip - could’ve probably gone with a small but the medium gives me a larger, slouchier look than on models which is ok. Will see how it holds up after wash & wear.

I love the color and weight of this. It’s not too heavy, yet feels warm to wear in cooler temperatures. It goes great with jeans but is still a bit dressy. It’s oversized so it’s great for lounging around in too!

评论概述: It's fall when I say it is
评论详情: I got this product at the end of July. It is MISERABLY hot where I am. Doesn't matter, still wanted this sweater. With this sweater and the A/C it *almost* feels like Fall inside. This is a very soft and comfortable sweater, very good weight and washes nicely (please use garment bags on knit items). My favorite part is that the neckline doesn't make me feel trapped. It has a boyfriend fit, so a little baggy but that means COMFY.
This sweater fits perfect. The design is nice and it's thick so it will be great in the winter. The material is soft and the quality is well worth the price.

This sweater is beyond my expectations! It is super soft and well made. I am happy to be able to get amazing quality for decent price. It’s warm and true to the color in the add. It is a slightly large Oversize fit which I love!

I absolutely love this sweater.  It is extremely soft and warm.  It’s going to be a great sweater for the fall/winter.  The color is spot on and the detail is amazing and it made well.  I love the fit.  I bought a medium and the sweater is a perfect relaxed fit, which is the way I like them.  The thickness is just right.  Recommend
Cute and soft

This sweater is perfect for those casual fall days! I was initially concerned about the fit because in the pictures it looked a little boxy, but it turned out to be a great purchase - it's comfortable, flattering, and well-made. Plus, the cable knit design adds a nice touch of style.
Super cute sweater is a neutral staple piece for my fall wardrobe!

评论概述: Thick; really good for autumn and winter
评论详情: Nice and thick. Great colour, great fit. Lovely sweater!!

This is THE perfect Fall sweater. It was super cozy, fit, oversized, and the neutral colors are perfect. Would be so cute with leggings and boots or jeans and flats. The quality exceeded my expectations!!

I recently ordered this chunky cable knit sweater in beige, and I love it. The sweater is soft and well-made, making it perfect for fall and winter. It has an oversized, slightly baggy fit that is just the right balance—it's cozy without being overwhelming. If you prefer a tighter fit, consider sizing down.  You can wear this sweater with jeans, leggings, or a skirt. I ordered the beige and is true to the pictures. For reference, I'm 6' and 195 lbs and ordered a large, which fits perfectly. Again, if you want a tighter fit consider sizing down. I’m very satisfied with both the fit and the quality of this sweater. Highly recommend it!

This is a fantastic sweater, perfect for those cool early fall days. The color is a really rich burgundy and I like the black contrast edges along the bottom and sleeves. It fits exactly as expected in my usual size, slightly oversized, relaxed fit just as pictured. The knit is very soft and cozy, and it’s not too bulky.  Can’t wait to wear this all season!

This is a nice women’s crewneck long sleeve sweater. It provides ample warmth and looks stylish unlike a typical sweatshirt. Wish it was a little smaller/closer to normal sizing… I ordered a Small, but it fits at least like a Medium.
